mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ACHIEVEMENT (ID, ACHIEVEMENT_NAME, ACHIEVEMENT_SCHEDULE_CATEGORY, ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_PATH, ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_NAME, ACHIEVEMENT_MISSION_COUNT, ACHIEVEMENT_GET_POINT) VALUES (SEQ_ACHIEVEMENT.NEXTVAL, #{achievementName}, #{achievementScheduleCategory}, #{acheivementImgPath}, #{achievementImgName}, #{achievementMissonCount}, #{achievementGetPoint})
INSERT INTO TBL_ACHIEVEMENT_COMPLETE(ID, ACHIEVEMENT_CURRENT_MISSION_COUNT, ACHIEVEMENT_ID) VALUES (SEQ_ACHIEVEMENT_COMPLETE.NEXTVAL, #{achievementCurrentMissonCount}, #{achievementId})

INSERT INTO TBL_MEMBER_ACHIEVEMENT(ID, MEMBER_ACHIEVEMENT_DISPLAY , MEMBER_ID, ACHIEVEMENT_COMPLETE_ID) VALUES (SEQ_MEMBER_ACHIEVEMENT.NEXTVAL, #{memberAchievementDisplay}, #{memberId}, #{achievementCompleteId})
mapper.select: SELECT TA.ID AS ID, TAC.ID AS ACHIEVEMENT_COMPLETE_ID, TMA.ID AS MEMBER_ACHIEVEMENT_ID, TA.ACHIEVEMENT_SCHEDULE_CATEGORY AS ACHIEVEMENT_SCHEDULE_CATEGORY, TA.ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_PATH AS ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_PATH, TA.ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_NAME AS ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_NAME, TA.ACHIEVEMENT_GET_POINT AS ACHIEVEMENT_GET_POINT, TA.ACHIEVEMENT_MISSION_COUNT AS ACHIEVEMENT_MISSION_COUNT, TAC.ACHIEVEMENT_CURRENT_MISSION_COUNT AS ACHIEVEMENT_CURRENT_MISSION_COUNT, TMA.MEMBER_ACHIEVEMENT_DISPLAY AS MEMBER_ACHIEVEMENT_DISPLAY FROM TBL_ACHIEVEMENT TA JOIN HR.TBL_ACHIEVEMENT_COMPLETE TAC ON TA.ID = TAC.ACHIEVEMENT_ID JOIN HR.TBL_MEMBER_ACHIEVEMENT TMA ON TAC.ID = TMA.ACHIEVEMENT_COMPLETE_ID WHERE TMA.MEMBER_ID = #{id}
